title: Linux: How to Run VirtualBox VMs from the Command Line
author: Jack Wallen
description: Oracle's open source VirtualBox offers a solid GUI for managing virtual machines. But sometimes you'd prefer to use the command line. Here's how.
cntitle: Linux：如何从命令行运行VirtualBox虚拟机
cndescription: Oracle的开源VirtualBox提供了一个可靠的GUI来管理虚拟机。但有时您可能更倾向于使用命令行。方法如下：
